text: the fighting broke out at about one
o'clock this afternoon local time we
were next to the airport that had been
occupied by armed groups pro-russian
separatist groups since this morning
they had entered the building about 3:00
a.m. local time and there were
negotiations ongoing between them and
the Ukrainian forces and then all of a
sudden we heard two fighter jets and
that circled overhead and they were met
by anti-aircraft fire and then shortly
after that three attack helicopters
arrived flying very low over done yet
Airport and there were sustained round a
machine gunfire I'm looking over the
airport on town now and I can still see
black smoke billowing out from some part
of the air porn XP Airport control tower
now the gunfire seems to have subsided
at the moment it's not yet clear whether
the Ukrainians have managed to retake
control of years
